column1: Local Foods////I have been to Local Foods on 5 or 6 occasions now
column2: and I am HOOKED! At this point
column3: I've had the egg truffle sandwich
column7: and all are delicious. The concept behind the restaurant - local foods grown and raised in a humane environment - is extremely important to me
column8: and I've long wished for a restaurant with that concept in mind in Houston. Local Foods is it! The food has always been great
column10: the ambiance is nice . . . I love it!
